name: BabyBubblez! Lite
description:
✮✮✮ DRAW the WindStream to GUIDE the bubbles through the world and BLOW DANGER AWAY! ✮✮✮ 

✮✮✮ INSTA-BUY! ✮✮✮
It is a TOTALY NEW EXPERIENCE combining the controls of LINE DRAWING with the gameplay of top-down ACTION/PUZZLE.   It’s EASY enough to pick up and PLAY for CASUAL game players but builds and requires serious SKILLS before finishing. Drawing from our game making expertise over the past 15+ years, LEVELS are HAND BUILT using tried and true game design principles. And the BABY is SUPER CUTE and fun to LAUGH with.  

✮✮✮ FEATURES ✮✮✮
✔ Unique gameplay mechanic, the WindStream, guides the bubble and pushes enemies at the same time
✔ Art and characters inspired by children’s books and animation such as Winnie the Pooh™, Spirited Away™ and Looney Tunes™
✔ Hand Crafted levels with unique layouts
✔ Full version has Achievements supported by GameCenter
✔ Full version has 18 levels with 4+ hours of gameplay

✮✮✮ NOT FEATURES ✮✮✮
✘ Killing
✘ Limited Lives
✘ Starting Over
✘ Redundantly Multiplying Enemies
✘ Rehashing Tired and Overused Phone Game Types

✮✮✮ MORE ✮✮✮
